FwkSenCnt.MEANING: Mary's hymn of praise on learning she is to be the mother of Jesus (Luke 1 46-55)

ExCnt.EX: Mary herself prophesied , in the Magnificat that :  Henceforth all generations will call me blessed .
Earlier this year , I set my cassette recorder to tape Bach 's Magnificat in D from an original recording .
Gombert , Clemens , and Richafort wrote Magnificats .
